column4: i reinstalled compizfusion last night, everything works but not the cube, it's not a cube it's a 2 sided object, my desktop is set to 4 desktops so i don't know what is going on with this, is there something else i'm missing, what am i doing wrong?
open ccsm and go to General>Destop Size> put in 4 1 1 as size
oh i never even noticed that option was in the manager as well, thanks for your help man! :D
